name: bl
notes: Buffer List for collecting and managing multiple buffers with a readable Buffer interface. GENUINELY BROKEN: Fails with 'Cannot redefine property: Symbol(nodejs.util.promisify.custom)'. The bl package attempts to redefine built-in Node.js symbols on readable-stream's internal objects, specifically trying to add util.promisify support to the Stream prototype. Workers' stricter object property definitions don't allow redefining already-frozen symbol properties on built-in objects. This is a fundamental incompatibility with how bl tries to monkey-patch Node.js stream internals for promisify support. For buffer concatenation in Workers, use native Buffer.concat() or manual buffer accumulation.
